metadata.title: CVE-2014-8105 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: 389 Directory Server before 1.3.2.27 and 1.3.3.x before 1.3.3.9 does notproperly restrict access to the "cn=changelog" LDAP sub-tree, which allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information from the changelog viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
